channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grafitti on Upper Bath street wall, 21st July
item.description:
Graffiti on wall in Upper Bath Street near junction with Bath Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163, Bath Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars parking on corner of motershead drive - gray close junction, 21st July
item.description:
Cars are continually parking on the corner of gray close and motershead drive junction causing obstruction to my driveway. It makes it very difficult for me to get my van on my drive to avoid parking it on the road causing an obstruction
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mottershead Drive, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Brambles and nettles blocking footpath, 21st July
item.description:
The public footpath from Brockhampton Lane Swindon Village that runs to the field under the railway bridge that leads to Hyde Lane and the public footpath that runs adjacent to Seasons Club House ( Cheltenham Town Football Training Ground ) in Swindon Village are both over run with nettles and brambles, making it almost impassable for a walk with my young grandson today which as a resident of Hyde Lane I was hoping to make good use of in the school holidays with my Granchildren, like many others I am sure. Your help in clearing this would be greatly appreciated. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Quat Goose Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Subsidence in path near school gate, 21st July
item.description:
Outside Shurdington primary school gate which is located in Greenway Close Shurdington. The nearest propertyâ€™s is 10 Greenway Close and 1 -Lambert Gardens Shurdington.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Greenway Close, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repaired curbstone poor repair, 21st July
item.description:
The curbstone outside my house 19 Cornmeadow Drive, was repaired as it had a chip in it. The highway team informed me there were missing bricks in drain. There are still missing bricks in the drain even though he said they would be replaced. The tarmac they used to fill the whole they damaged has started to lift already. Poor workman ship.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Cornmeadow Drive, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
